attributes.action: We, the undersighned, support a referendum on independence for the north of England as a whole.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament does not meet the needs of the people of the North of England. A campaign for devolution for the north east does not go nearly far enough as it does not include Merseyside, Yorkshire etc. I believe we should have the choice to decide whether or not to continue to be ruled by Westminster or to rule ourselves.

rejection.details:
Please see the petition below:

Petition Title: Create an Independent North

Created by: Rachael Cowan

Closing: 30/03/2015
